title: 1.8怎么用命令方块清除一个箱子里面所有的物品
author: whx1024
txt_content: 如题，但不能破坏箱子的朝向和名称。

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
blockdata x y z {Items:[ {id:0,Slot:0,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:1,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:2,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:3,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:4,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:5,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:6,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:7,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:8,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:9,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:10,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:11,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:12,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:13,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:14,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:15,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:16,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:17,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:18,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:19,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:20,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:21,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:22,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:23,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:24,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:25,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:26,Count:0}]复制代码
其中x y z 改为箱子坐标

replies.author: whx1024
replies.txt_content:
林扬骐 发表于 2016-1-24 11:00
其中x y z 改为箱子坐标
两个箱子连在一起，指令还可以用吗？

replies.author: whx1024
replies.txt_content:
林扬骐 发表于 2016-1-24 11:00
其中x y z 改为箱子坐标
/blockdata ~ ~ ~1 {Items:[ {id:0,Slot:0,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:1,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:2,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:3,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:4,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:5,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:6,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:7,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:8,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:9,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:10,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:11,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:12,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:13,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:14,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:15,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:16,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:17,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:18,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:19,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:20,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:21,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:22,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:23,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:24,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:25,Count:0},{id:0,Slot:26,Count:0}]

失败了。箱子在命令方块旁边

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
/blockdata x y z {Items:[]}复制代码
我们都想多了……这样就可以了……{:10_493:}
